metadata.dc:author: Garrido, M
metadata.dc:description: Monica Garrido, an important personality of the Argentine culture, was chosen as a member of the Executive Council of the ICOM. That is the reason her important work in the cultural life of her Mother Country is described here.
metadata.dc:title: Monica Garrido en el Consejo Ejecutivo del International Council of Museums.
[Monica Garrido on the Executive Council of the International Council of Museums].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista del Museo de la Facultad de Odontologia de Buenos Aires
